description: This file defines API route handlers for managing user subscriptions in a FastAPI application, including creating, cancelling, and checking the status of subscriptions via Stripe.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User model class representing application users, including Stripe customer IDs and subscription status.

methods.name: Dict create_subscription_payment( plan_type: str, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles creation of a new Stripe subscription for a specified plan type.

methods.name: cancel_user_subscription( current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Cancels the current active subscription for a user.

methods.name: Dict get_subscription_status( current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user) )
methods.description: Retrieves the current subscription status and related info for a user.

ctags.name: cancel_user_subscription
ctags.signature: ( current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: create_subscription_payment
ctags.signature: ( plan_type: str, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
